main event: Fourteen round objects the size of a grapefruit, color yellow to deep red, were observed flying in formation over Highland, North Carolina on September 14, 1956.
interesting points: The objects seemed to fly in formation, but the type of formation was unknown.
The objects had a tremendous exhaust, but the size could not be estimated.
The objects moved from southwest to east to northeast and then returned, swooping down and up.
The sighting lasted for approximately one and a half hours.
The report states there were additional witnesses, but the information provided was from a single source.
sighted object: Fourteen round objects, size of a grapefruit, color yellow to deep red
